Name: Sermon Lost Flag
AttributesDescription:
Every time a Resonator deals Basic Attack DMG, their next Basic Attack DMG is Amplified by 4% for 15s, stacking up to 5 times.

This Token has unlimited uses in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: A flag used by ships transporting Acolytes from the Order between islands.
ObtainedShowDescription: Every time a Resonator deals Basic Attack DMG, their next Basic Attack DMG is Amplified by 4% for 15s, stacking up to 5 times.
